name: VT State Parks Adventure
description:
Do you have what it takes to #WorkOutsideTheBox? Test your abilities as a Park Attendant, Parks Maintenance Worker, and a Park Interpreter in this side-scrolling 8-bit adventure game.

Think the parks life is for you? Learn more, check job listings, and apply online at www.vtstateparks.com/jobs 

Music: BenSound.com
